warehouseid=#{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

orgid=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, controltype=#{controlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, costpur=#{costPur,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, wagemode=#{wageMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wagebasic=#{wageBasic,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, wagesw=#{wageSw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, wageew=#{wageEw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, wagepw=#{wagePw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, wagecw=#{wageCw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, wageow=#{wageOw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, wagese=#{wageSe,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, costcer=#{costCer,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, totalweight=#{totalWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, goldtype=#{goldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goldcost=#{goldCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, goldweight=#{goldWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, labeltype=#{labelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length=#{length,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, width=#{width,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, height=#{height,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, circel=#{circel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, franchiseeid=#{franchiseeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, moucode=#{mouCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, moudtlcode=#{moudtlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stoneshape=#{stoneShape,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serialno=#{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, epc=#{epc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fgoldweight=#{fGoldWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ccategoryid=#{cCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcategoryid=#{fCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scategoryid=#{sCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks=#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime=sysdate, updateuser=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wageadd=#{wageAdd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, purchasenum=#{purchaseNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subcode=#{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cernum=#{cerNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weightrange=#{weightRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, primarycode=#{primarycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, noticeno=#{noticeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wholesale=#{wholesale,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, stonesize=#{stonesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, costfin=#{costFin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, costchk=#{costChk,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select d.suppmoucode as suppmouCode,d.id as id from jy_scm_moudledetail d where d.status='1' and d.suppmoucode like '%'||UPPER(#{code})||'%'

select w.id as warehouseid, l.id from jy_scm_warehouse w left join jy_scm_warehouse_location l on w.id = l.warehouseid where w.status = '1' and l.status = '1' and w.defaults = '1' and l.defaults = '1' and w.orgid=#{orgId} and rownum=1
select m.id ,m.categoryid from jy_scm_moudledetail d left join jy_scm_moudle m on d.moudleid = m.id where d.id=#{id}

select p.id, p.name, p.mouCode, p.goldType, p.fGoldWeight, p.stoneShapeRange, p.totalWeight, p.price from JY_SCM_IMS_PRODUCT p where 1=1
AND p.id in
#{item}
order by p.createtime

select p.id, p.mouCode, p.goldType, p.fGoldWeight, p.stoneShapeRange, p.totalWeight, p.price from JY_SCM_IMS_PRODUCT p where p.id in
#{item}

select jp.id, jp.name, jp.mouCode, jp.goldType, jp.fGoldWeight, a.stoneweight as stoneweight, jp.totalWeight, jp.circel, jp.price, jo.outboundno, jo.checkTime from JY_SCM_IMS_PRODUCT jp left join jy_scm_ims_accessories a on a.productid = jp.id and a.STONEFLAG=1 inner join jy_scm_ims_outbounddetail jod on jod.code = jp.code inner join jy_scm_ims_outbound jo on jo.id = jod.outboundid inner join jy_scm_pur_ordersplit jos on jos.productid = jp.id where jos.orderDetailId = #{orderDetailId}
mapper.update: update JY_SCM_IMS_PRODUCT t set t.status ='B' where t.id in(select t1.productid from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT t1 WHERE t1.orderDetailId=#{orderDetailId} and t1.status='0' )

update jy_scm_ims_product set orgid=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warehouseid=#{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locationid=#{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime=sysdate, updateuser=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inWarehouseDate=sysdate, inwarehousenum=#{inWarehouseNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select m.id,m.code from jy_scm_moudle m where m.status='1' and m.code like '%'||UPPER(#{code})||'%'
select jsp.id,jsp.code from jy_scm_ims_product jsp where jsp.code like '%'||#{code}||'%'
select jsp.id,jsp.inwarehousenum from jy_scm_ims_product jsp where jsp.inwarehousenum like '%'||#{inWarehouseNum}||'%'
select distcode from jy_base_org where id=#{id}
select * from jy_scm_ims_product jsp where jsp.code=#{code}
select code from jy_scm_moudle m where m.id=#{id}
select m.code, f.name,f.id from jy_scm_moudle m left join jy_scm_moudledetail d on m.id = d.moudleid left join jy_base_franchisee f on d.suppliercode = f.id where d.id = #{id}

mapper.select: {call mytest.pro_temporary (#{0},#{1})}
select * from jy_scm_ims_temporary where userid=#{userid}
select m.code, f.name, f.id from jy_scm_moudle m left join jy_scm_moudledetail d on m.id = d.moudleid left join jy_base_franchisee f on d.suppliercode = f.id where d.suppmoucode = #{suppmoucode}
select STATUS from JY_SCM_FLOW_NOTICEORDER where noticeno=#{noticeNo}
select * from JY_SCM_IMS_PRODUCT where noticeno=#{noticeNo}
select count(1) from jy_scm_ims_product p where p.moucode=#{mouCode} and p.status='B' and p.orgId in (select o.id from jy_base_org o where o.companyid=#{orgId} and o.orggrade != '4')
select t.code, t.name, t.cateid, t.catejewelryid, t.warehouseid, t.locationid, t.count, t.totalweight from jy_scm_ims_product t where code = #{code}
